question.title: AndroidStudio library problem does not allow call to WindowCompat.enableEdgeToEdge()
question.body:
Another failing attempt to implement Edge to Edge in an old Android app. Documentation says I can call ComponentActivity.enableEdgeToEdge() or WindowCompat.enableEdgeToEdge(getWindow()) but the compiler says both functions do not exist.

The API documentation says that the first requires some parameters, but the second should be valid. When I pull up the source code for androidx.core.view.WindowCompat at cs.android.com, it shows the enableEdgeToEdge() function I am trying to call. But when I pull up the source for the same module within AndroidStudio, I get a completely different source which lacks that function.

Relevent excerpts from Android.xml

  compileSdk 36
  implementation 'androidx.core:core:1.16.0'

I tried invalidating caches and restarting AndroidStudio with no success.

So what else can I try?

Thx for any assistance.

answers.body:
Depending on your target SDK and androidx.core:core version, there are two ways to enable edge-to-edge:

  • For Android 15 (API 35) or lower:
    Keep using older API (call it before super.onCreate()).
    For Java: EdgeToEdge.enable(this)
    For Kotlin: enableEdgeToEdge() (extension function for ComponentActivity)

  • For Android 16 (API 36) or higher:
    You can use new API WindowCompat.enableEdgeToEdge() (call it after super.onCreate())
    Note: You will require dependency androidx.core:core:1.17.0 or higher

It turns out that the new calls were added in a new beta version of the core library, which Android Studio will not normally recommend using. Manually specifying

implementation 'androidx.core:core:1.17.0-beta01'

fixed this problem.

question_comments.body: Because I do not know how to read the version information in the documentation.  And because 1.16.0 was the highest version that AndroidStudio recommended.  Manually specifying 1.17.0 got rejected.  Upgrading to latest versions of Gradle and AGP did not help.  But rereading the comment and manually specifying version 1.17.0-alpha01 did.   AndroidStudio recommended upgrading this 1.17.0-beta01 and now my everything compiles.  On to the next problem....
The documentation for WindowCompat.enableEdgeToEdge() shows that it was added in Core .1.17.0-alpha01. What makes you think it would be available in Core 1.16.0?

79692807.body: Looks like androidx.core:core:1.17.0 is out of beta now.
@MadhavBhavsar AppCompactActivity is a subclass of ComponentActivity, at least with recent versions of appcompat dependency
I think this EdgeToEdge.enable(this) is for ComponentActivity. I am still facing problem for old Java application with AppCompactActivity.
